entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:10 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023
